item.description:
@script_owned4 wrote:

[quote=“neontheteacher, post:6, topic:127796”]Grats, i just leaned bitmaps and what procedure meens etc. from that sweet guide by bebe maybe i will meet up with you on a messenger sometime and we can learn together.

luaghs

i make myself hurt.

=[

rofl[/quote]
Your stupid,lmao.

About the script…

Never,ever use movemousesmooth for a runescape script it is very detectable,so is clickmouse and movemouse.

Try using TypeSend.
Note:I know I used sendkeys in my auto-talker but typesend was too slow…

There is really no point in putting x,y coords if there is no coords to replace them…
Like this l
l
l
/

x:=100; y:=100;

item.title: Autologin
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

It’s good to hear you’ve learnt more about scripting.

The script is alright, but for learning purposes, I’m going to point out everything I found wrong in this script, Please don’t think of it as me Insulting you, Consider it Constructive Criticism.

You use SRL yet you dont have SetUpSRL in the main loop nor have you used any SRL functions.

If you have SRL you should use MMouse and Mouse.
MMouse only moves the mouse, Mouse Moves and Clicks.

If your using SRL try using TypeSend because what you have there will enter your username, then enter your password THEN press enter.
TypeSend types the text then presses enter.

Although this is only to log in, it’s good practice to use correct waits, NEVER use an exact number for waits, always do something like: Wait(500 + Random(500));

x and y are already declared in SRL.
It didnt give you a duplicate Identifier error because you mispelt include.

Read full topic

item.title: Autologin
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

I made this script for my friend agility trainer and thought i would post and see what you guys have to say. Well ive learned alot in the pass couple days so be expecting some other BETTER scripts from me.

[code]{=====================================================================
MRRULES AUTOLOGIN ||
Script was made for friends agility trainer || ||
Just replce Username/Password with your info and your ready to go. ||
======================================================================}

program Autologin;

{.incluse SRL\SRL.scar}

Const
username = ‘oldpc’; //Username here
Password = ‘parker’; //Password here

Var x,y : Integer;

Procedure username1;
Begin
if (getcolor(435, 291) =5524040) then
wait(100);
movemousesmooth(x,y)
wait(100);
clickmouse(435,291, true);
wait(500);
SendKeysSilent(username)
writeln(‘enterd username’);
end;
procedure password1;
Begin
if (getcolor(361, 273) =16777215) then
wait(500);
movemousesmooth(361, 273)
wait(500);
clickMouse(361, 273,true)
wait(500);
SendKeysSilent(password+chr(13));
writeln(‘enterd password’)
wait(1000);
end;

begin
username1;
password1;
end.[/code]

Please don’t flame me and say theres abillion of these… I already know that and i just want to know what you think and how i can improve it.

Also heres some stuff ive learned in the past couple days.

bitmaps
all diffrent forms
DTMs
Radial walking

Read full topic
